meanings.definition: A dive in which the front of the body strikes flat against the water.
meanings.sent1: During the pool competition, his bellyflops made a big splash.
meanings.sent2: The lifeguard warned against doing bellyflops to avoid injuries.
meanings.sent3: The synchronized swimmers decided to add bellyflops to their routine for a comedic touch.
meanings.sent4: Her attempt at diving gracefully turned into a series of embarrassing bellyflops.
meanings.sent5: The bellyflops echoed across the pool, drawing everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: He bellyflops into the water whenever he jumps off the diving board.
meanings.sent2: Kids love to bellyflops into the pool on hot summer days.
meanings.sent3: The daredevil decided to bellyflops from the highest diving platform.
meanings.sent4: She bellyflops with such enthusiasm that she creates a big splash every time.
meanings.sent5: In the diving competition, the goal is to bellyflops with perfect form and minimal splash.

meanings.definition: The sound produced by a bellyflop.
meanings.sent1: The bellyflops of the kids playing in the pool could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent2: The bellyflops of the divers echoed through the swimming complex.
meanings.sent3: The comedian used a recording of bellyflops as a funny sound effect in his show.
meanings.sent4: The bellyflops of the seals on the rocks sounded like applause to the fishermen.
meanings.sent5: The bellyflops of the pelicans diving for fish added a rhythmic beat to the ocean sounds.
